sentences.en: For instance, using an attack mode against a psionic hydra affects the creature as a whole.
sentences.cn: 例如, 对一只灵能多头蛇蜥使用心灵攻击模式将对此生物整体造成影响.

sentences.en: Ghost Wei Ge à ? left negative, right hand catch Hydra , face ferocious is no deposit.
sentences.cn: 鬼尉 左手负革阑, 右手捕长蛇, 面目狰狞,现无存.

sentences.en: Hydra - Increased base damage by 15 % per rank.
sentences.cn: 九头海蛇-基础伤害增加了15%,每级.

sentences.en: Hydra - Increased base speed of Hydra projectile.
sentences.cn: 九头海蛇 - 增加基础九头海蛇攻击速度.

sentences.en: Hydra - The conquest of a very powerful enemy.
sentences.cn: 九头蛇 - 对强敌的征服.

sentences.en: It is a hydra - headed tree of unreason with a thousand roots.
sentences.cn: 他是枝繁叶茂的无理性之蛇发妖树.

sentences.en: Likewise, a psionic hydra can only use one attack mode per round.
sentences.cn: 同样地, 一只灵能多头蛇蜥每轮也只能发动一次心灵攻击模式.

sentences.en: Mixed with moisturizing ingredients to maintain skin Hydra silk slip.
sentences.cn: 混合有保湿成分,维持肌肤水润丝滑.

sentences.en: Narrator: Leaving the rotting carcass of the Hydra behind, Kratos sets sail once more.
sentences.cn: 讲述人: 离开了身后那腐烂着的九头蛇怪的尸体, 克瑞托斯又再一次开始了航行.

sentences.en: This beast is Hydra , it has terrorized my seas for far too long.
sentences.cn: 这个怪兽就是许得拉, 它威胁我的海洋已经旷日持久.

sentences.en: Week of Hydra: Double growth for Hydra and Chao Hydras.
sentences.cn: 九头蛇周: 九头蛇产量加倍.

sentences.en: Week of Hydra: Double growth for Hydras and Chaos Hydras.
sentences.cn: 九头蛇周: 九头蛇产量更加.

words.tran_cn: 九头蛇；[无脊椎]水螅；难以根除之祸害

trans.tran_cn: 水螅，难于根除的祸患，九头蛇
trans.tran_en: a snake in ancient Greek stories with many heads that grow again when they are cut off
